benefits: Free supplementary cards for your spouse or partner
Quick and easy contactless payment functionality
Automatic basic travel insurance cover of up to R2 000 000
For ease and convenience we offer a budget facility for larger than normal purchases which clients can then pay off over 3, 6, 12, 24 or 36 months
Optional Credit card insurance to ensure financial security and peace of mind in the event of death, disability, critical illness or retrenchment
Option to join the Membership Rewards Programme

features.name: Membership Rewards™
features.shortDescription: Earn points on virtually all the spend on your card and enjoy a range of fantastic rewards.
features.description: Please note you will receive a Membership Rewards™ Redemption card in order to spend you rewards.

features.name: Redemption Card
features.description: We' have made it quick and easy to redeem and spend all the rewards you've earned using the Redemption card.

features.name: Affinity Rewards
features.shortDescription: Through our programmes you can support the arts, environmental conservation initiatives or sports or help needy children, at no cost to you. You choose the affinity programme you'd like to support.
